Articles.Content:
I've always wanted to make a KSP cinematic...

..but I have to rescue Bob in my career game!

I should work on texturing KOLLOSAL... Haven't done that in a while.

Or I could do this project... Or this other one...

 

Ever had too many KSP ideas?

Edited April 22, 2016 by ThatGuyWithALongUsername

I have a six page tutorial on high-speed rovers - unfinished.

I started to make a :"company" and I have a webpage and half a dozen sandbox designs 95% done. (I even have volunteers for beta testing) but never got done w/ that. (and then I had envisioned cinematic aerospace company TV commercials)  

Currently I have  career game year-one manned mission to Eve AND Duna I'm about to launch. (That's what I'm actually doing)

(Part of the problem is Squad pulling the rug out from under us w/ new builds.)

EDIT: And about 8 threads I've wanted to start on these forums, that I never got to...

Edited April 22, 2016 by Brainlord Mesomorph

Yep. It has frustrated the exhaust out of me for the last few years. One of the oldest bugs in KSP I think fix it SQUAD. I have just started playing 1.1 and it has just gotten worse.

 

loving it

Well, My old project, an air-transportable base made of 2.5m modules on wheels that can load and unload into a mk3cargobay I paused when I heard 1.1 was changing wheels... a good decision... none of the designs work anymore.

I was also doing a Duna+ water planet modding project... but I decided that I couldn't use it with my career and the current duna base I have... its still fun exploring a "dead world" with signs of past water.

So my new project was to add another duna sized planet at kerbin's pseudo-L5 point... but I don't want it to just be a copy of duna as far as the topography... so I started finding altitude maps of mars to use that... then I found the Mars.cfg for RSS... and I plan on rescaling it to fit in with stock planets, then adding an ocean and making the atmosphere thicker(and O2 containing)... and placing it at kerbin pseudo-L5

Then I've still got my career save to continue.

Luckily I just finished a RL project (PhD), but now I've got a 3 week vacation with the GF, and I don't think I'll do much KSPing during that time.

2 hours ago, ThatGuyWithALongUsername said:

I've always wanted to make a KSP cinematic...
..but I have to rescue Bob in my career game!
I should work on texturing KOLLOSAL... Haven't done that in a while.
Or I could do this project... Or this other one...

Ever had too many KSP ideas?

Yes!  My main focus is my Emiko Station story, but it gets in the way of me wanting to take on a few challenges. 
And like you, I would love to do a cinematic someday as well.

Ever had too many? Look at me, I've got a Saturn Shuttle mission series, a short story (link in sig) series, running the Real Space Program (link also in sig) and I'm starting two new projects RIGHT NOW.

In short, I will never feel I have enough.

Edited April 22, 2016 by ZooNamedGames

I've got The Making of 2001: A Space Absurdity to write, as well as 2010: A Something, Something (must come up with a title for that) to do as well.

Then there's a couple of cinematics I've got planned, one of which is pretty complex.

Then as well as that stuff, I'd like to take a crack at making some parts addons.

Then I mustn't forget to actually play the game in 1.1

 

Busy times ahead.
Yes. 20 ships to Dres. With 60 annoying dockings.

5 hours ago, Just Jim said:

Yes!  My main focus is my Emiko Station story, but it gets in the way of me wanting to take on a few challenges. 
And like you, I would love to do a cinematic someday as well.

That reminds me, I'm behind on reading Emiko Station. I'll add that to the list.

I ended up rescuing Bob, it went well:

It may be worth the RAM to install Automatic Screenshots, that's a really vague mission report.

9 hours ago, purpleivan said:

I've got The Making of 2001: A Space Absurdity to write, as well as 2010: A Something, Something (must come up with a title for that) to do as well.

Then there's a couple of cinematics I've got planned, one of which is pretty complex.

Then as well as that stuff, I'd like to take a crack at making some parts addons.

Then I mustn't forget to actually play the game in 1.1

 

Busy times ahead.

2010 The Year we make Kontact.

(it writes itself)

I have left KSP for a while and getting back where I left it since a few days. I have a lot of things going on.

Playing RSS and starting to seriously go interplanetary after messing around a long time in Earth orbit. I have about 15 missions planned to the outer solar system, but my first probe will reach Jupiter in 2 years and Saturn (its destination) in 7 years.

At the same time I'm developping reusable boosters and a manned spacecraft for a flyby of Venus, messing around with shuttles and jet planes, designing a new station to be assembled in LEO, starting to make plans for a base on the Moon, managing two stations (one in LEO and one in Low Lunar Orbit), and regularly building random launchers that I don't need (including a family of launcher that range from 110t to 200t to LEO while I have no payloads near these masses).

And that is on my modded 1.0.4 game. I have a stock career save in 1.0.5 and am starting to mess around with 1.1 (planning to port my ~50 mods 1.0.4 setup to 1.1 and adding even more mods).
